mapper.update: update ITEM set PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WID = #{wid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TACT = #{tact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIST = #{dist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DNAME = #{dname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIM = #{tim,jdbcType=DATE}, TXT = #{txt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where IID = #{iid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select IID, PID, WID, TACT, DIST, DNAME, TIM, TXT from ITEM
